scripts.build: npm run reset && npm-run-all build:* && mv ./_js/* ./Client/wwwroot/js/ && npm run start:server
scripts.production: npm run reset && npm run build:brixi && npm run build:css && npm run build:js && node ./build/minify.js && node ./build/release.js && npm run publish
scripts.publish: dotnet build && dotnet publish -c Release --self-contained -r linux-x64 && rm -rf ./compiled && mkdir ./compiled && mv ./Server/bin/Release/netcoreapp3.1/linux-x64/publish/* ./compiled
